ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc42:0.2_0: The nuns’ rules and their analysis
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc42:0.3_0: The chapter on offenses entailing confession
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc42:0.5_0: The training rule on used seats
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc42:1.1_0: At one time when the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in the Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc42:1.2_0: the nuns were using high and luxurious couches.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc42:1.3_0: When people walking about the dwellings saw this, they complained and criticized those nuns,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc42:1.4_0: “How can nuns use high and luxurious couches? They are just like householders who indulge in worldly pleasures!”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc42:1.5_0: Nuns heard the complaints of those people,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc42:1.6_0: The nuns of few desires complained and criticized Thullanandā,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc42:1.7_0: “How can nuns use high and luxurious couches?” ...
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc42:1.8_0: “Is it true, monks, that nuns do this?”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc42:1.12_0: This won’t give rise to confidence in those without it ...” ...
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc42:1.13_0: the Buddha said, “And, monks, the nuns should recite this training rule like this:
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc42:1.14.1_0: ‘If a nun uses a high couch or luxurious couches, she commits an offense entailing confession.’”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc42:2.1.4_0: ... The nun who has been given the full ordination in unanimity by both Sanghas through a legal procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements that is irreversible and fit to stand—this sort of nun is meant in this case.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc42:2.1.6_0: one that is oversize is what is meant.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc42:2.1.8_0: one decorated with images of predatory animals.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc42:2.1.10_0: if she sits down or lies down on it, she commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc42:2.2.2_0: if she uses a high couch after cutting off the legs;
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc42:2.2.3_0: if he uses a luxurious couch after breaking it;
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc42:2.2.5_0: if she is the first offender.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc42:2.2.6_0: The second rule, the second training rule on fire, is finished.
